originalText.text: What can I say about Ahma Pharmacy! There‚Äôs to many good things to say about the workers at Ahma. I will say this, from my years of experience with dealing with the workers at this pharmacy is exceptional! They are hands down the best I have ever had to deal with. They are all very professional patient, kind, and go above and beyond for their patients. I have only dealt with the females that work there and they have treated me like I was one of their family members. To name a few, Grace, Lavern, Ashley and Annette. I know for sure that I am leaving other names out, but it does not matter who you get, that are all the same. I am humbled and greatly appreciate the help you girls have showed me and I will forever be grateful! Keep up the good work, and if any of your bosses sees this review, these girls deserve a RAISE! Thank you again for all that you do, and may God continue to bless each and every one of you! Have a very Merry Christmas and a Happy new year, stay safe!

originalText.text:
I just spoke to Ashley at AhmaRX. Ashley was very professional, extremely helpful and knowledgeable and so pleasant and wonderful to speak to. Whoever hired Ashley is to commended for having such an excellent employee and a great representative of your pharmacy.
Thank you very much.

originalText.text: Great experience with these guys. My customer support rep was extremely helpful and went out of her way to resolve a somewhat complex and time-sensitive request. Thanks again and strongly recommend!

text.text: Great experience with these guys. My customer support rep was extremely helpful and went out of her way to resolve a somewhat complex and time-sensitive request. Thanks again and strongly recommend!

originalText.text: Filling my Rx required cold pack. They were wonderful about shipping it wherever I was, no problem. This was true all through the pandemic as well. They were so easy to work with.

text.text: Filling my Rx required cold pack. They were wonderful about shipping it wherever I was, no problem. This was true all through the pandemic as well. They were so easy to work with.

originalText.text: I've had only great experiences since using Ahma RX!! They are always professional and courteous. A nice young lady named Nylah was extremely helpful, kind & professional while assisting me & she had a very calming phone presence & speaking voice!!! Nylah did a wonderful job assisting me and she was able to answer all of my questions which I greatly appreciate! Thanks so much üôè
